None
review: I came to the clinic for my sensitive front tooth. Upon taking an x-ray I came to know that the tooth is fractured due to a minor accident happened 10 years back. The doctors were very courteous and polite in explaining me about my current tooth condition and what are the possibilities to cure it. I wanted to extract the tooth and go ahead with implant option and followed by a RCT for adjacent tooth. The doctors are extremely careful in satisfying us and they took atmost care to get the tooth crown match my natural teeth shade as well. The clinic and dental tools are kept very clean , there is not question about hygiene. The procedure was also not painful. The doctors took care to make dentistry less painful as possible. Overall I am happy that I choose Rootz Dental .
reply_text: thank you for your valuable feedback mam..
replier_name: Rootz Dental Care and Implant Center

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Chandra is the best doctor I've ever experienced in my life.. I've undergone 6 dental scaling/cleaning till date.. Dr.Chandra is the best among them, with respect to,
1. the way she undertook the treatment.
2. the patient friendly approach.
3. the quality of the treatment.
4. the flexible techniques based on patient's comfort.
4. explaining the patient what's the actual problem and ways to overcome that.
5. keeping the patient innformed of what's she actually doing, throughout the treatment period.

My opinion is..
A Doctor who keeps the patient in their comfort zone, is far better than a traditional Doctor who just performs the treatment..

It's so difficult now-a-days to see such a Doctor.. Thanks a lot to Dr.Chandra..

Regards,
Sethu
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback sir.....
replier_name: Rootz Dental Care and Implant Center
